data.--config-add config: Add or update a config file on a service
data.--constraint-add list: Add or update a placement constraint
data.--container-label-add list: Add or update a container label
data.--container-label-rm list: Remove a container label by its key
data.--credential-spec credential-spec: Credential spec for managed service account (Windows only)
data.-d, --detach: Exit immediately instead of waiting for the service to converge
data.--dns-add list: Add or update a custom DNS server
data.--dns-option-add list: Add or update a DNS option
data.--dns-search-add list: Add or update a custom DNS search domain
data.--entrypoint command: Overwrite the default ENTRYPOINT of the image
data.--env-add list: Add or update an environment variable
data.--force: Force update even if no changes require it
data.--group-add list: Add an additional supplementary user group to the container
data.--group-rm list: Remove a previously added supplementary user group from the container
data.--health-cmd string: Command to run to check health
data.--health-retries int: Consecutive failures needed to report unhealthy
data.--health-start-period duration: Start period for the container to initialize before counting retries towards unstable (ms|s|m|h)
data.--health-timeout duration: Maximum time to allow one check to run (ms|s|m|h)
data.--label-add list: Add or update a service label
data.--label-rm list: Remove a label by its key
data.--mount-add mount: Add or update a mount on a service
data.--mount-rm list: Remove a mount by its target path
data.--no-resolve-image: Do not query the registry to resolve image digest and supported platforms
data.--publish-add port: Add or update a published port
data.--publish-rm port: Remove a published port by its target port
data.--read-only: Mount the container's root filesystem as read only
data.--restart-max-attempts uint: Maximum number of restarts before giving up
data.--restart-window duration: Window used to evaluate the restart policy (ns|us|ms|s|m|h)
data.--rollback-max-failure-ratio float: Failure rate to tolerate during a rollback
data.--rollback-monitor duration: Duration after each task rollback to monitor for failure (ns|us|ms|s|m|h)
data.--rollback-parallelism uint: Maximum number of tasks rolled back simultaneously (0 to roll back all at once)
data.--secret-add secret: Add or update a secret on a service
data.--stop-grace-period duration: Time to wait before force killing a container (ns|us|ms|s|m|h)
data.--update-max-failure-ratio float: Failure rate to tolerate during an update
data.--update-monitor duration: Duration after each task update to monitor for failure (ns|us|ms|s|m|h)
data.--update-parallelism uint: Maximum number of tasks updated simultaneously (0 to update all at once)
data.--with-registry-auth: Send registry authentication details to swarm agents
